channel.title: PAR:AMUN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in PAR:AMUN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Amundi Sees ECB Cutting Twice More Even as Traders Bet It’s Done
item.description: The European Central Bank will cut interest rates two more times as economic growth is likely to remain lackluster, according to Amundi SA’s chief investment officer.

item.title: Amundi Sees ECB Cutting Twice More Even as Traders Bet It’s Done
item.description: The European Central Bank will cut interest rates two more times as economic growth is likely to remain lackluster, according to Amundi SA’s chief investment officer.

item.title: Amundi Sees Dip Buying on French Bonds, Stocks After Drop
item.description: Dip buyers are returning to French bonds after yields surged following a surprise call for a confidence vote by Prime Minister Francois Bayrou, Amundi SA Chief Investment Officer Vincent Mortier said.

item.title: Amundi Sees Dip Buying on French Bonds, Stocks After Drop
item.description: Dip buyers are returning to French bonds after yields surged following a surprise call for a confidence vote by Prime Minister Francois Bayrou, Amundi SA Chief Investment Officer Vincent Mortier said.
